title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) (No. 2) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) (No. 2) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister foreign affair minister defence) (no 2) order

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) (No. 2) Order
(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) (No. 2) Order
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign 
Affairs with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair effect 9 april 2024

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) (No. 2) Order
heading: 3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence 
with effect from 9 April 2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [712] 3
text_norm: 3 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair appointed special adviser tanaiste minister defence effect 9 april 2024 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 8th november 2024 712 3

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) (No. 2) Order
heading: Sharon McGowan
text_raw:

Sharon McGowan 

Gráinne Weld

SIMON HARRIS,
